typeSystemDescription.name: Baleen Type System - Language
typeSystemDescription.description:
XML definition of the Baleen type system language annotations.
This XML file classified as UK OFFICIAL.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.language.Text
typeDescription.description: An area of block of text, to be considered independently over other blocks.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.language.Sentence
typeDescription.description: Defines a sentence from the source document.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.language.WordToken
typeDescription.description: The output from some text tokenization process.

featureDescription.name: partOfSpeech
featureDescription.description: The part of speech (POS) tag. Usually a Penn Treebank tag.

featureDescription.name: sentenceOrder
featureDescription.description: If not null, this should be the index position of the word token within parent sentence.

featureDescription.name: lemmas
featureDescription.description: A list of alternative lemmas for this word token.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.language.PhraseChunk
typeDescription.description: Annotation to store the result of shallow parsing, which provide noun phrase and verb phrase constituents, rather than just WordTokens.

featureDescription.name: constituentWords
featureDescription.description: Word tokens which comprose the constituent.

featureDescription.name: headWord
featureDescription.description: The head word of the constituent phrase

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.language.Paragraph
typeDescription.description: Defines a paragraph from the source document.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.language.WordLemma
typeDescription.description: Specifies a lemma form for a word token

featureDescription.name: partOfSpeech
featureDescription.description: The part of speech (POS) tag for this lemma. Usually a Penn Treebank tag.

featureDescription.name: lemmaForm
featureDescription.description: The normal form for this lemma.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.language.Dependency
typeDescription.description: Grammatical dependencies between wordtokens, as output from a Dependency Grammar Parser

featureDescription.name: dependencyType
featureDescription.description: The type of grammatical dependency (eg ROOT, VBMOD, etc)

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.language.Pattern
typeDescription.description: The text pattern between two annotations (usually entities) which has been processed to be more meaningful than simply the covered text between them

featureDescription.name: source
featureDescription.description: The source entity (first entity in the sentence)

featureDescription.name: target
featureDescription.description: The target entity (last entity in the sentence)

featureDescription.name: words
featureDescription.description: The collection of word tokens which form this pattern.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.language.Interaction
typeDescription.description: A word which acts as a relation in a sentence (eg 'saw' in the 'John saw the car').

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: The value of the relationship, typically the spanning text within the sentence or the .

featureDescription.name: relationshipType
featureDescription.description: Denotes the semantic type of the relationship between entities.

featureDescription.name: relationSubType
featureDescription.description: Used to record any sub-type information for the relation, for example the sub-relations defined within the ACE dataset.
